sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import NavbarNew from "../../components/common/NavbarNew"; import Sidebar from "../../components/common/Sidebar"; const StudentCourses = () => { const [courses] = useState([ { id: 1, title: "Web Development Fundamentals", instructor: "Dr. Sarah Johnson", progress: 75, enrolled: "2024-01-15", duration: "12 weeks", status: "In Progress", thumbnail: "üåê", students: 45, rating: 4.8, }, { id: 2, title: "Data Science with Python", instructor: "Prof. Michael Chen", progress: 60, enrolled: "2024-01-20", duration: "16 weeks", status: "In Progress", thumbnail: "üìä", students: 38, rating: 4.9, }, { id: 3, title: "Mobile App Development", instructor: "Dr. Emily Davis", progress: 45, enrolled: "2024-02-01", duration: "14 weeks", status: "In Progress", thumbnail: "üì±", students: 52, rating: 4.7, }, { id: 4, title: "Digital Marketing", instructor: "Mr. James Wilson", progress: 100, enrolled: "2023-11-10", duration: "10 weeks", status: "Completed", thumbnail: "üìà", students: 65, rating: 4.6, }, ]); const [availableCourses] = useState([ { id: 5, title: "Artificial Intelligence Basics", instructor: "Dr. Robert Brown", duration: "15 weeks", thumbnail: "ü§ñ", students: 42, rating: 4.9, price: "Free", }, { id: 6, title: "Cloud Computing with AWS", instructor: "Ms. Jennifer Lee", duration: "12 weeks", thumbnail: "‚òÅÔ∏è", students: 55, rating: 4.8, price: "Free", }, ]); return (
{/* Header */}

My Courses

Manage and track your enrolled courses

{/* Enrolled Courses */}

Enrolled Courses

{courses.map((course) => (
{course.thumbnail}
{course.status}
{course.rating}

{course.title}

Instructor:{" "} {course.instructor}

{/* Progress Bar */}
Progress {course.progress}%
‚è±Ô∏è {course.duration} üë• {course.students} students
))}
{/* Available Courses */}

Available Courses

{availableCourses.map((course) => (
{course.thumbnail}
{course.price}
{course.rating}

{course.title}

Instructor:{" "} {course.instructor}

‚è±Ô∏è {course.duration} üë• {course.students} students
))}
); }; export default StudentCourses;
